title: #37: The Death of Meredith Kercher
description:
The Real Crime Profile Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) begin to analyze the brutal murder case of Meredith Kercher and how the bizarre series of events engulfed Amanda Knox.
